name: Toon Candy - Box Crush
description:
Toon Candy - Box Crush is latest addictive candy crushing game of 2018. This latest game of 2018 crush the candy game have 200 different levels with many challenges. just click on two or more same color box or candy blast it. Create combos by blasting 4 or more same box at a time. Crush the candy game is the very addictive game in the entire world so everyone needs something new inside of the game, our music and graphics is different from others so the peoples like to spend more time in it.

play the candy blast box pop game today and become a high scorer of the game. Join this crush the toy game adventure and have the best blast crushing fun.

Let me ask you a question are you a big fan of puzzle game? so this game gives you more excitement and brain teasers.
Simply perfect tapping on proper boxes gives you extra chance to make more score. This candy crushing game is very easy to play and helps you to pass out your boring time.

This is the best puzzle block game ever with attractive music and sound effects. Just tap on two or more matching adjacent candy of the same color and make a blast of candy. There are plenty of levels for fun filled with cool puzzles and different challenges to training your mind. Simple and sober graphics with amazing music. Shocking boosts and gifts that are genuinely valuable on the way.

very easy to play just pop cubes and win the levels. Totally free to play addictive box crush game. Exiting gameplay, just use your brain to pass level easily. Match 4 same candy or box and you should get the rocket power. Match 5 same candy blast or box pop you get bomb power and you match 6 or more and you get the star power.

These powers help you to smash many of boxes at a time and gives you a bonus and extra score. Play today this amazing crush game. There is every level have different targets that you need to reach, so you planned your moves for make high score. Try to make more power for pass level with an extra bonus. Crush the toy game it's always having fun with great time out. Collect coins from passing levels.

Crush all colorful toy blocks with this super tapping game "Toon Candy - Box Crush". You can play this fun cubes game anytime, everywhere and as much as you want, there is no internet connection required for playing the game. If you use fewer moves you will get more extra power for make higher score. Simply you will get five lives in a day. if you are not playing with your brain you lost your life on every level failed or game over.

If you are don't do any move and restart level you can't lose your lives. complete all challenges that give inside the levels and pass it simply by pop all the tiles. Enjoy playing "Toon Candy - Box Crush" and solve all the fun levels!

Experiment with this fun box crush game and appreciate comprehending all the mind mysteries. Get this marvelous blast game for free from Google Play and experience a definitive puzzle block blast! Tap on the screen to pop boxes, open amazing boosts and powers and plan your moves to complete levels! Enjoyed the game? We would love to get your criticism! Tell us what we can add to make your gameplay much more agreeable and gain your 5-star review.
